o Exclude the possibility of an underlying medical condition as a cause for fever (e.g. pneumonia) with
an incidental miscarriage
o A septic termination of pregnancy/miscarriage and must be referred immediately to a specialist facility.
 Commence with the standard sepsis miscarriage management protocol below.
Management of a septic miscarriage 
• Stabilise before referral as follows:
o do a rapid assessment of the patient- circulation, airway and breathing
o insert an int
